author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how a senior software developer who got demoted at his job hacked the systems he was in charge of and deployed deadman switch malware in the companies active directory system that locked people out once he was fired.

https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/texas-man-convicted-sabotaging-his-employers-computer-systems-and-deleting-data

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

title: When an Angry Employee Turns Hacker
